message: ERROR: The server/client does not support receiving this message type!
ERROR: Bad Room. Room does not exist, or there are no connections to the desired room.
ERROR: Character in use. Cannot reprise a character that is already tied to a socket.
ERROR: Bad Monster. Cannot loot a nonexistent, not present, or living monster.
ERROR: Stat error. Cannot accept inappropriate player stats. Try again!
ERROR: Not Ready. Caused by attempting an action too early, like changing rooms before sending START or CHARACTER.
ERROR: No target. Cannot loot nonexistent characters, fight players in different rooms, or message someone offline.
ERROR: No fight. Fight cannot happen for some reason, like no live monsters in room.
ERROR: Player vs. player combat is currently not supported on this server.
ERROR: Monster. Cannot create or reprise a monster character.
